document.discussion_title: Top 10 most beautiful Chinese athletes in Rio |Celebrities |chinadaily.com.cn
document.topic_text: Top 10 most beautiful Chinese athletes in Rio Updated: 2016-08-22 14:02 Large Medium Small As we watch the intense Olympic competition in Rio unfold, we must not underestimate the beauty that shines from within the female athletes themselves. Here is a list of the 10 most beautiful female athletes competing for China. They bring great honor to the country as well as to the literal beauty of sports. Born in 1992, Shu Siyao is a group rhythmic gymnast. [Photo/Weibo] | About China Daily | Advertise on Site | Contact Us | Job Offer | Copyright 1995 - 2010 . All rights reserved.
